text:
="preserve">Anthony Mathias Banzi (28 October 1946 – 20 December 2020) was a Tanzanian Roman Catholic bishop. Banzi was born in Tawa, Tanzania. He became a priest in 1973. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Tanga from 1994 until his death in 2020.
Banzi died in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania on 20 December 2020, aged 74.
